divs: Sighting Details3 of my students and I saw what looked like a black bird way up in the sky but it was much too big and did not move like a bird. It seemed to hover in one place and then move. It kept doing these odd movements for about 10 minutes or so and there appeared 3 jets up in the same area. My students saw the black object decend straight down to the ground very quickly from very high above. That is what we saw. We are in the south area of santa fe NM
trends: There have been 20 other sightings in Santa Fe
There were no other sightings in Santa Fe on or around April 12th 2010
Object Flight Path: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
Summary: Black object high in the sky..thought it was a bird but too high and not acting like bird. It stopped and moved and eventually dropped straitht down. 3 jets seemed to follow.
